alert.note: Alert for Color Country Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 26 at 7:23PM MDT until May 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 496... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 496 Color Country Mountains. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Winds will decrease during the overnight hours and increase once again by late morning in most locations. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Daytime minimum humidities around 9 to 15 percent. Overnight humidity recoveries around 30 to 40 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
